description: Surrogate unique identifier for this image record.
System timestamp when this image record was created or last updated, stored as a string in YYYYMMDDHHMMSSmmm format.
User-entered caption or description of the image’s subject or purpose.
Binary image content (BLOB) storing the original uploaded file.
Identifier of the parent record to which this image belongs; used with parentr to resolve the target entity.
Type of parent entity for this image, used with parent to locate the owning record; confirm allowed codes with SME.
Key of the corresponding record in the legacy source system for migration or cross-reference.
Name of the table in the legacy source system from which this record originated.
Code indicating the association context or ordering of this image relative to its parent; meaning likely system-specific—confirm with SME.
Text label or reference describing the association code; exact usage unclear—confirm with SME.
Base64-encoded representation of the image, used for transport or APIs when binary BLOBs are unsuitable.
Inactive indicator for the image record (True/False), used to hide or archive without deletion.
Date the image was recorded or became effective in the system, stored as YYYYMMDD string; likely transaction date—confirm with SME.
